main event: A civilian observed a gray oval-shaped UFO that sped up and vanished into the clouds in Boise, Idaho on July 15, 1967.
interesting points: The object was estimated to be approximately 50 feet across.,The observer reported the object moving at an estimated speed of 500-600 MPH.,The object was observed for an extended period as it executed a near full backtrack in the sky.,The object was described as silent and similar in appearance to a pot lid.,No physical evidence was reported and the observer had not seen a similar object before.
sighted object: one gray oval-shaped object in the sky
